content: Following up on kind of Kashy's question about Q4, I'm kind of thinking, I got to have the kind of pleasure of looking at your Voyager tracker at your demonstration site in Aurora, Colorado, and kind of see all the different components and coming away from that, as I understand it, the one piece that really you have to wait until you know exactly what module specifications, what the final module is going to be, it's the Pearland or some people call it the rail.
